text: D. Infante Henrique, Duke of Coimbra (6 November 1949 – 14 February 2017) was an Infante of Portugal. He was a member of the former Portuguese Royal Family as the youngest son of Duarte Nuno, Duke of Braganza, and Princess Maria Francisca of Orléans-Braganza. Infante Henrique was fifth in the line of succession to the former Portuguese throne.de Badts de Cugnac, Chantal. Coutant de Saisseval, Guy. ‘’Le Petit Gotha’’. Nouvelle Imprimerie Laballery, Paris 2002, p. 738-742, 748-749, 756-759 (French) His elder brother, Duarte Pio, Duke of Braganza, is head of the House of Braganza, which ruled Portugal until 1910. Henrique died on 14 February 2017 in Lisbon, aged 67.VIP - D. Henrique, irmão de D. Duarte de Bragança, morre aos 67 anos ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Portuguese royalty Category:People from Bern
title: Infante Henrique, Duke of Coimbra
